column2: Okay, friend, are you with me? Ready to try fob #3?
Alright. So let's go to the clubhouse. You can go ahead and open it.
The button on the right opens the clubhouse.
So suspenseful! Let's see if this third fob works.
Whoa. Awesome! The three panels are open!
I don't understand why Riley is saying, but the box is fully open now.  Let's talk to Saniel!
No prob. Hope you come back soon â€“ we're so close!
